name: Paradigm
headline: A reimagined workspace with AI at its core
description:
Centered around the primitive of a spreadsheet, Paradigm puts swarms of intelligent agents at your fingertips. The real power of Paradigm comes with scale: imagine having tens of thousands of interns working for you in parallel. Paradigm is 1000x faster than manual data collection, completing an average of 500 cells per minute.

Join our waitlist www.paradigmai.com/join

founders.name: Anna Monaco, Founder
founders.description: Founder & CEO at Paradigm | Penn CS & Entrepreneurship

generated_description:
**Company Summary: Paradigm**

Founded in 2023 and based in the heart of San Francisco, Paradigm is steeped in fresh innovation as part of the Y Combinator Batch W24. The company’s mission? To redefine workspaces by harnessing the transformative power of artificial intelligence. 

Imagine the tedious task of data collection—now amplify that with the speed and efficiency of AI. Paradigm initially centered around the familiar landscape of spreadsheets, but quickly evolved into a platform where swarms of intelligent agents operate at your command. This isn't just a minor improvement; Paradigm boasts a staggering ability to complete data tasks at a rate of 500 cells per minute. Yes, you read that right—1000x faster than manual methods. 

With just a nimble team of three, Paradigm offers users an easy-to-navigate interface that allows for the gathering, structuring, and actionable use of data with a level of precision that would make any human analyst proud. Think of it as having tens of thousands of interns working in parallel, all coordinated seamlessly.

For those eager to explore this revolutionary tool, Paradigm is currently inviting users to join their waitlist at [www.paradigmai.com/join](https://www.paradigmai.com/join). 

In terms of branding, Paradigm encapsulates its essence in a simple yet powerful slogan: “Let An Army Of Agents Work For You.” If you're curious about the blend of AI and spreadsheet efficiency, their website and social media platforms—[Twitter](https://www.paradigmai.com/<https:/twitter.com/tryparadigm>), [Instagram](https://www.paradigmai.com/<https:/www.instagram.com/tryparadigm>), and [LinkedIn](https://www.paradigmai.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/company/tryparadigm/>)—are worth a visit for a deeper dive into their vision.

In summary, Paradigm is not just a company; it's a glimpse into a future where AI enables unprecedented levels of productivity and precision in data management. If you're ready to step into this future, keep an eye on Paradigm.
